plot: An expert locksmith becomes a safe-cracker for a Hong Kong gang. Once involved in crime, however, he finds it difficult to get himself uninvolved
title: Manghyang
plot_es: An expert locksmith becomes a safe-cracker for a Hong Kong gang. Once involved in crime, however, he finds it difficult to get himself uninvolved
plot_en: An expert locksmith becomes a safe-cracker for a Hong Kong gang. Once involved in crime, however, he finds it difficult to get himself uninvolved
